talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Chop it! <sp:5:0:0>Pound it! <sp:5:0:0>Steam it!<sp:5:0:0> Throw in a
Hyrule bass! Boil it! <sp:5:0:0>Cook it! <sp:5:0:0>Add that
raw meat!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Now just a pinch of the secret extract, <sp:5:0:0>aaand...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_01>Done! <sp:5:0:0>Prepare to be <sp:5:0:0>amazed!<sp:5:1:0>
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Wh-<sp:5:0:0>what happened here?!<sp:5:0:0>


What do you have to do to make such a
thing? <sp:5:1:0>What did those ingredients do to
deserve this?!<sp:5:1:0>
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>H-<sp:5:0:0>how?!<sp:5:0:0>


Can you even call this food?!<sp:5:1:0> There
are rocks softer than this! <sp:5:1:0>I might have
chipped a tooth just looking at it.
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>I get it. All great chefs need time.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Come back if you change your mind.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>It's your first time, so you get a discount.<sp:5:1:0>
Let's call it <clr:0000>five rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>It— <sp:5:0:0>It's only <clr:0000>five rupees<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> Ultimate flavor
for the ultimate price!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Welcome to Moza's Hideaway Restaurant,
home of the ultimate dish!

Truth is, we haven't officially opened.<sp:5:0:0>
You must have a good nose!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:LaughS_01>I mean, you just couldn't stay away from
these tempting aromas, right?
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_00>Phew! <sp:5:1:0>That was tough.


And now...the ultimate dish.<sp:5:0:0> Behold!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you give me <clr:0000>failed dishes<clr:ffff>, I can work
my magic!
talk0025: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>All right! <sp:5:0:0>Let me see this culinary disaster.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>With this extract, I'm unstoppable! It was totally
worth the trip to that town in the northeast.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>So, are you ready to turn your failed food
into the ultimate dish?
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_01>Doesn't it?<sp:5:0:0> Any customer with such a
discerning sniffer is welcome here.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>For I, Moza, <sp:5:0:0>have performed a miracle.
After years of culinary experimentation,
one failed dish after another...
I mastered the ultimate dish.


<snd:Chat_00>I'll let you in on my ultimate technique.
*ahem*

<sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:Work_01>Take a failed dish!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Work_00>Pound it into shape!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Cook it again!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_01>And take it to the next level!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um, sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I got a little carried away.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:SurpriseM_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Was it...too expensive?<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>No... <sp:5:0:0>That can't be it. I'm sure you're
just cowering in the face of the
ULTIMATE DISH.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Here are the dishes you gave me.<sp:5:0:0> Come
back when you're ready.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Sad_00>Huh? Is there something wrong with your
nose?<sp:5:1:0> That's no smoke signal. I'm just
cooking, obviously.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>For I, Moza, <sp:5:0:0>spend all my time trying to
achieve culinary excellence. And after a
mountain of failed dishes...
I mastered the ultimate dish.


<snd:Chat_00>I'll let you in on my ultimate technique.
*ahem*

<sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:Work_01>Take a failed dish!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Work_00>Pound it into shape!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Cook it again!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_01>And take it to the next level!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um, sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I got a little carried away.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Yeah. <sp:5:1:0>Haven't you tried throwing things
that aren't food into your cook pot?<sp:5:0:0>

When you do,<sp:5:0:0> you'll often end up with a
failed dish.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0301>They can fail in different ways. <sp:5:0:0>There's
<clr:0000>dubious food<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>rock-hard food<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Dubious, they say! <sp:5:0:0>Rock-hard, they call it!<sp:5:0:0>
Psh. Just because you throw in some ore
or monster bits.<sp:5:0:0>
What terrible things to say, don't you
think? <sp:5:1:0>Haven't they ever heard the saying
"nothing ventured, nothing gained"?<sp:5:0:0>
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Welcome to Moza's Hideaway Restaurant,<sp:5:0:0>
home of the ultimate dish.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Success is built on failure!


Bring me your <clr:0000>failed dishes<clr:ffff> when
you're ready to turn them into
something amazing.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So, are you ready for some
culinary magic?
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You're ensnared by this captivating scent,
aren't you?

Don't worry. There's nothing wrong with
being tempted by delicious food.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>Sorry.<sp:5:0:0> I was just thinking about my
life before becoming a master chef.

Bring me your <clr:0000>failed dishes <clr:ffff>when
you're ready to turn them into
something amazing.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease_00>Um. <sp:5:1:0>Sorry about that.<sp:5:0:0> This is such a
spectacular canvas that I couldn't
help myself.
<sp:3:0:2:0200>Anyhow, it's dangerous to leave this be.<sp:5:0:0>
I'll cook it, pound it, and make it ultimate!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Thanks for your busi—


<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Hey! You don't have enough <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>!


Ugh. Here. <sp:5:0:0>Take your food back.


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>Come again when you've saved up enough
rupees. <sp:5:1:0>No dining and dashing.
